contexts.context: Chimere used Dagon's Protonymic in an incantation to invoke a <mark>sorcery</mark> that would gradually drain all of Dagon's power into the void...
...The Dwemer were defeated, with great slaughter, and terrible <mark>sorceries</mark> were used, resulting in the utter extermination of House Dwemer...
...The "ash vampire" of Ashlanderlegend is not undead. <mark>Sorceries</mark> and blessings affecting the undead reportedly have no effect on these...
